title: Foldable phones by 2023 says EU's Graphene Flagship
text:
Foldable phones by 2023 says EU's Graphene Flagship 4:59pm GMT - 01:32 
Foldable phones will be on the market within five years, according to the Graphene Flagship programme. As Ivor Bennett reports, the miracle material will revolutionise not only mobiles but medicine too. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Foldable phones will be on the market within five years, according to the Graphene Flagship programme. As Ivor Bennett reports, the miracle material will revolutionise not only mobiles but medicine too. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2oyyNaI
